text: James Edward Geringer (born April 24, 1944) is an American politician. He was the 30th Governor of Wyoming from 1995 to 2003. Geringer is one of the founding governors of Western Governors University (WGU) and is currently chairman of the WGU Board of Trustees.Board of Trustees ==References== ==Other websites== * Wyoming State Archives * Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Wyoming Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Kansas State University alumni
title: Jim Geringer
